website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Classic Renaissance comes from the brand's Classics Collection. It is an affordable shoe that is high on comfort. The design doesn’t look clunky and instead, gives the feet a slimmer look. The sneaker looks to be sturdily built, and the finishing is just as excellent. This footwear also keeps the feet in comfort with its well-padded construction.
pros: A significant number of testers have found the Reebok Classic Renaissance to be comfortable
Many users commend the padded inserts of the shoe, which they say is a nice touch
A lot of reviewers are pleased with the price of this shoe from the Reebok brand
The Classic Renaissance is a durable shoe, according to a few purchasers, and the sneaker’s upper and outsole both seem like they'll last a long while
Many buyers say the shoe is versatile and can be great for walking and workouts at the gym
Some customers have said that the shoe looks well-made because there are no obvious glue marks or broken stitches
Two individuals have reported that this shoe does well in wet and cold weather because the feet stay dry
One consumer has mentioned how pleased he is with the style of the Reebok Classic Renaissance because it makes his wide feet look narrow
One person has noted the shoe’s non-skid sole
cons: A lot of buyers have complained that the Reebok Classic Renaissance’s fit is a bit too snug
The low-top footwear needs more arch support, according to several reviewers
The Classic Renaissance feels stiff for the first few uses, a few say
The sole is not very flexible, some consumers have reported

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be Fake Reebok
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the same shoe before, but purchased those directly from Reebok. I think these shoes are fake? I’m not sure. They are really poorly made and aren’t supportive at all like my other Reebok classics. I can feel my heel already digging into the cushioning as I walk. They also look too white and not real leather. Disappointed overall
customer_reviews.author: Justin A.

customer_reviews.title: They sendit not good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product its bad manufacturer have problem in back side check picture.
customer_reviews.author: Noid

customer_reviews.title: ... and found them to be some of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while back and found them to be some of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I wear a size 14 4E. I loved the shoes so much I bought a second pair as a back up. I am wearing them right now, and they exceed my expectation. They fit perfectly my wide, slightly malformed feet. They keep my footing stable when I walk, feel like I am walking on air. A truly awesome shoe for getting around town, running errands, visiting friends, whatever. They look good, pretty standard look, nothing glitzy, only marginally fashionable. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kandah

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Comfortable Shoes That Fit My Size 15 Feet Quite Well
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Reebok shoes, they're my go-to brand as they always fit perfectly for my size 15s. These shoes are comfortable and seem to be made pretty well. They are very lightweight which I like and the cushioning is comfortable. I normally get about a year out of a pair of shoes and expect the same from these. If they fall apart quickly I will update the review. Otherwise, these are nice shoes and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Darren O'NeillTop Contributor: Classical Music

customer_reviews.title: If you purchase these shoes, you may want to try a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get a chance to wear the shoes as as soon as I removed one from the box it already looked to be too small. I tried the shoe on anyway and although I liked the look of the shoe it was too small and narrow for any type of a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: No longer soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Reebok Classic for more than 20 years and this is the first pair I have ever returned. I ordered 10 wide which is what I always get, but these are both too wide and too long. That is only part of the reason I returned them. Reebok has always had very soft cushioning and soft rubber soles. These shoes have neither. The only cushioning effect comes from the insoles which are ok, but still left me feeling like I was walking on concrete. The simulated leather uppers are also harder than before. It is clear that something has changed in the manufacturing. I can only hope that they change it back to the way it was.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I Cant Stop Buying These
customer_reviews.text: These are literally my go-to shoes. I've probably boughten four pairs alone last year. I just started on my first pair gifted to me by my fiance already this year. You may be asking yourself, why so many....well I just love white sneakers and reebok seem to be perfect for the amount of walking I do every day. They are stylish and retro so you honestly can go wrong. Also, I am a woman I don't get the women's ones I like these and Im usually a size 11 in women so I go for the 9.5 in men. I hope this helps ;)
customer_reviews.author: Saint Kaid

customer_reviews.title: I guess they're okay.
customer_reviews.text: One thing I'd completely forgotten about 80s shoes was that they were *never* comfortable right out of the box. Although they look wide-ish in the picture (that's what got me in spite of other people's reviews), they do run narrow. They feel cheap. They don't "smell" like new Reeboks used to! And like all shoes back in the 80s, they will need breaking in. They will probably be okay after that. They do look good. I'm going to try to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie V

customer_reviews.title: They're Fashionable, Sleek, But Not Gaudy (ostentatious)
customer_reviews.text: I'm not fond of loud, avant-garde footwear or apparel. I'm never comfortable at a gallery of modern art — canvasses with seemingly incoherent brush strokes of clashing colors that represent... Well, you see where I'm going with this. I feel best in attire that represents an image I have of myself: Confident, trustworthy, and without fanaticism; a subtle appearance of sophistication, respect, and an impression of intellect. With changing trends in style, I can't find shoes like this in stores. I feel fortunate to have found these wonderful, comfortable, tastefully stylish sneakers. I see they've dropped in price since I purchased them in June of 2019. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoes. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. PROS: Good support Thick hard sole is what I need to prevent aggravation of a pinched foot nerve. Hard sole good for walking on uneven or rocky surfaces. Comes in wide sizes. Reasonably Priced. Long lasting. Cons: Sides of sole material are hard to clean and become a light gray while the uppers clean up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: R. Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to check for lumps of glue......
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this shoe 4 stars because there was a large lump of glue under insert pad that cause him to get a bruise on bottom of foot near large toe. Because he didn’t wear these right away, couldn’t return them. Always buy these shoes for him, but, quality control missed this. Had to tear insert out, use long screwdriver to remove lump of glue, and re-glue insert back in. I recommend you put these on and wear for awhile right away so if there is a problem, you find out right away.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Menzies

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet ouch
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look good but do not fit people with wide feet and I never really had to buy specific shoes that would specify for wide feet. These would not be good for standing on your feet all day, my feet tend to swell a little and would then feel right causing me pain, I had to use a show stretcher. Also the bottom has no floor grip, not get it d for slippery floors.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky P.

customer_reviews.title: Fit is somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, however the x-wide shoes do not seem like they are x-wide. I still like them anyway, but if you're looking for a extra-wide shoe, these are probably not what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing Reebok tennis shoes for years. Our daughter called them "old man shoes" because they were all white leather tennis shoes. When I couldn't find that style anymore, I ordered these tennis shoes (with his "Okay, I'll try these"). Well...he likes them veryyyyyy much and wants me to buy another pair for him. He likes how the heel is cut away and not have the excessive rubber heel sticking out past the heel of the upper part of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JBT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition. Arrived on time!
customer_reviews.text: Look great but seem more like a 11.5. they are a little tight. But other than that they are great. And showed up the day they were supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: britt j thomas

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Reebok Classic Renaissance shoe is an excellent all purpose sneaker. The tread holds up well and the uppers are stitched with high quality. It is a white shoe so to keep them nice it is helpful to clean them regularly. I find that a light scrub with a mildly damp sponge and dish soap works well to keep them clean without damaging the leather and wipe dry with a paper towel or clean cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Lytol

customer_reviews.title: Always try on shoes regardless of brand, they've always fit in this size & brand before.
customer_reviews.text: I've been away on vacation & didn't try these out until today 1 day late of being able to return. unfortunately they don't fit to small so will have to throw them away, a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Sluggo

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable. Hard inside
customer_reviews.text: This made my heel hurt the following day. The insides is HARD and uncomfortable. I hate these. Waste of my money. My feet are sore from one day of wearing them. There is no way this is meant for someone who walks a lot on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: Lynn K GP

customer_reviews.title: The best ... Reebok.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light-weight. Perfect for walking and running. I used to photograph weddings and had to b on my feet for 10 to 15 hrs per day. Could not have done it without REEBOK.
customer_reviews.author: the photo guy

customer_reviews.title: Walking a-ok at work
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes months ago and im still using them for work. They are so comfy and hold up with all the walking at work. Im on my feet all day in a warehouse setting. I think most of us know how difficult it is to find the right shoes for this kind of work. I was so relieved they fit well and are holding up strong. Good job reebok.
customer_reviews.author: LizzyMurmaid

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Put these on and they fit right away. Break-in period was about a 1 mile walk and they are as comfortable as my old pair. I use them when I travel and am on my feet all day long and expect they will be as good as the pair they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves are pretty hideous.I wear these because I'm on my feet or walking alot at work. THEY ARE SO COMFORTABLE. I love them. Hideous/but comfy. I might buy them in white for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable once they are broken in which took me maybe three or four days. They keep my feet warm on cold days when I walk my dog. For the price, comfort, and warmth I think I made a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ARV

customer_reviews.title: Great Classic Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of all-time sneakers was the classic Reebok. This is PERFECT! So comfortable and just the right amount of cushion/protection. I bought 2 pairs just in case they might run out (black and white, thank you). I highly recommend this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: a bit tight
customer_reviews.text: I really like them, and I hope they gonna luse more, because now it's imposible to wear them more then 20 min. Inside very comfortable, but seams not width enough.
customer_reviews.author: NobleB1ch

customer_reviews.title: Size was not right.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 sneaker. The sneaker I got was too narrow and the toe almost touched the end of sneaker. I tried one of my other size 8 sneakers and it was fine. While I have bought a pair of sneakers on line before, this is one of the reasons that I don't like buying clothes on line. Amazon should have the ability to insist on consistent sizing standards.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I must say, I really do like this shoe, I have always wanted a all pair of shoes but I had to do my kids first and then wait on me, so now that I was able to buy me a pair i put them on for the first time today, yesssssssss
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Manuel

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Right from the getgo, the sneaker weight was good, not some foam / lightweight sneaker; the fit was exactly as I wished; the comfort provided was expected from a good sneaker, the looks were just as displayed and desired.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Belanger

customer_reviews.title: For Coolness
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are sleek and smooth. They make me feel like a real man should feel! I stand tall and erect, when I walk, they put a little bounce in my step. No jam or jello feel with these pups. Of course I wear these with fashionable socks, who wouldn’t?
customer_reviews.author: PJK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These sneaks are totally cool! Comfortable enough... The laces are a bit thin and I have some knots in them... No biggie. Looks alone are enough to give these 5-stars! Appreciate that they come in a 6.5! Thank you Amazon and Reebok!
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyKel

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Runs small,  4E is not wide enough!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace Reebok Men's Royal Trainer 4E that are wearing out - that fit right. These shoes are not extra wide like those were. Before anyone asks, I did order the 4E version, exact same size. Were tight to wear, and not comfortable. These will be getting sent back in the next couple days.
customer_reviews.author: NeO

customer_reviews.title: OK Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear Reebok Club shoes only. Couldn't find in my size, 14 wide, and tried this show. Not too crazy about it. Not near as comfortable as my Club, but they are constructed well ...
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I will be buying me another pair in Spring because I wear them daily. Love the comfort. I have long narrow feet and need men shoe but can't tell that they are a men shoe because its neutral
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Melton

customer_reviews.title: Worst Reebok comfort ever
customer_reviews.text: I love Reebook however the tongue on these shoes leaves a lot to be desired. This is the only pair of Reebok that have ever hurt my feet. I am just sorry I soiled them and can not return them.
customer_reviews.author: Claycpa1

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look nice, are comfortable, but the "wide" is way too narrow! Far below normal "wide" standards! If you need wide shoes DO NOT BUY these. If you don't need wide, you might like them...
customer_reviews.author: Bucky's Mom

customer_reviews.title: White shoes
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptic at first, but my husband is very happy with this purchase, it helps with his back!
customer_reviews.author: Arelys Duque

customer_reviews.title: Yay found them
customer_reviews.text: Husband has loved the classic renaissance shoes for many years. Ordered these and it hard to get him to wear anything else. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousAmI

customer_reviews.title: Fits As Expected, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected. Very comfortable, coming from someone who has problems with my feet and ankles these were a very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Just really cheap and overall bad quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: It wears in pretty badly. The build quality is very cheap. The foam insert is not removable, and didn't actually produce any support nor cushioning. The laces are also the cheapest I've ever seen. In the summer the cushion suffocates your feet and makes them really hot and sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Only for show
customer_reviews.text: I call them three week wonders First week perfect Downhill from there Lost shape Lost support
customer_reviews.author: claijammer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair -not ! shoes do not match
customer_reviews.text: Two different shoes-tried to return -UPS did not pickup-did not leave label-I am very ill(I have MS)I so I had a friend take to UPS I printed what they said was a label but it was not- they could not print a label -no link in email to print label-stuck with 2 shoes that do not match !
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: The comfort is there however the support is somewhat off. I have tried all socks and my foot slides all over the place in the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DaneA

customer_reviews.title: happy with transaction
customer_reviews.text: Get these for my husband who is very happy with these athletic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Sole already separating after a few wears
customer_reviews.text: Cheap only wore a handful of times sole is already separating to bad I really liked them pretty comfortable and I liked the style maybe fakes I don't know
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: confort at its best
customer_reviews.text: This is a throw back sneaker of the early 80s but man the comfort cant be matched
customer_reviews.author: Stalker

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable. Kind of firm fitting at first. Fits like your wearing a shoe and not a sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Li’Li’

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing error.
customer_reviews.text: Due to illness I only started using these in the past two weeks. There is something in the right shoe that causes pain and discomfort right above my big toe. Unfortunately it is too late to return these for credit. I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: RANDOLPH L COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how long they should last but....
customer_reviews.text: My pair arrived blemished. They looked ok for awhile but recently they failed spectacularly(see pic). Seems like they failed prematurely. They are about 7 months old.
customer_reviews.author: SWright

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he likes it. His usual size is 9.5 Wide, I ordered 10 Regular just in case and he says they fit well. He is usually weary picky about shoes but these were good for him. Only disappointment that they do not look like they’re made with real leather. Looks thin and a bit cheap, not sure if it’s real Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes fit well as described good fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Queenbee

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He got them as a Christmas present and he cannot believe the style AND comfort when he wears these!
customer_reviews.author: ADavis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. However were too small and we had to return.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect. I cant remember how good these are. Material used is top notch. Easy to clean and really comfy for walking and standing all day.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not anti-slip work shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these are anti-slip work shoes? My son wore this to work and he slipped more than his regular sneakers. He liked the look and comfort but I bought this for him as work shoes and it didn't help on that part.
customer_reviews.author: cbread

customer_reviews.title: Run a size too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable shoes, but they run a size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Bret barnard

customer_reviews.title: Nice retro look
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is made more for style than function. They are comfortable but not a true sport shoe. Love them anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, comfortable.  Timely arrival, is as described.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying and wearing this specific shoe design for years in my job as a truck driver. They fit well, comfortable throughout a long day. I will continue to search for and purchase this shoe as long as I continue working in this occupation.
customer_reviews.author: Randall New

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes to wear
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling, don't tire you're feet out, look good. Only gripe is that they took a bit to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon F. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: most comfortable light weight shoe I have, just a slight rub on my little toe, maybe should have gotten one size up to remedy that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that the pic y'all hot is bot the shoe I ordered. Besides that I love them all around
customer_reviews.author: slbeezie

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Broke down in 3 days of wearing them. Insole I was ripped to shreds while I was wearing the shoe. God I wish you shoes would have worked out for me
customer_reviews.author: Nate_b

customer_reviews.title: Need to get a half size longer to allow for the narrow toe box on D width.
customer_reviews.text: There appears to be too much fake leather on the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes had to return them they were to tight on my husband's feet.
customer_reviews.author: E N

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived when expected. They are a very bright white, which I like. They are pretty comfortable and so far I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Wubbaman

customer_reviews.title: Smallish?!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these shoes 4 stars. It's not the vendor's fault. They sent the size I requested. I guess Reebok shoes run somewhat small. Also, the gum sole is fine but the padding of the sole feels very firm. Firm in this case = hard. But they are made well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Golf

customer_reviews.title: Bright White
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful White shoes. Unfortuneately, I would be too afraid to own these in Oregon because they would look horrible after a few days outside in the real world. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Sickler

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but  way too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Gray/Gray, was very nice looking when they arrived. Tightest shoe I ever had on, I'm usually a 10.5-11. The 11's were way too small. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lex M

customer_reviews.title: Why did price double!?
customer_reviews.text: I like what I paid for it when purchased... why has price almost doubled!? I would buy 2 or 3 more at orginal price but not now.
customer_reviews.author: jlkidder

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes just don't understand how the prices change periodically 🤷‍♀️🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn orr

customer_reviews.title: Order a full size up
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 10.5. On a friends advice I ordered a 11 in this shoe and it was still too small. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: richhog64

customer_reviews.title: X-Wide was exceptionally small
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't impressed for a shoe that was listed as XXwide. Nice looking shoe and quality it seemed, just didn't have the extra width I was looking for. It seemed like just a regular width shoe. Easy Return with Amazon, great service.
customer_reviews.author: BenJammin

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, very light weight, very comfortable. Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Alson

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable. Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Feels very tight and uncomfortable after just a couple of hours of wearing it
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Two pairs unsatisfactory as packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Two pairs of these shoes were ordered. One pair was a size 9 in a size 9 1/2 box. The other pair had one shoe bent out of shape and had leather creases and a bow of the sole. Neither pair was tried on. Very unsatisfactory quality control. Reebock should be better than this.
customer_reviews.author: William Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ware them 8-10 hours and day for work. have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right shoe fits good left shoe was too tight
customer_reviews.text: Husband said the left shoe felt like it was too small and not the x wide
customer_reviews.author: Kim Rieger

customer_reviews.title: She loves them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. It’s very hard to find all white sneakers
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: these are good to go!
customer_reviews.text: this is better the ones my wife ordered from Amazon one year ago and we had to send back the stuck like chemicals perhaps they got there act together from last year are a different plant
customer_reviews.author: European-American-WASP

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Product is a bit tight. Overall, these sneakers work fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Michaels

customer_reviews.title: True to Size
customer_reviews.text: My son was very happy with this gift. They look great on them.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa DR

customer_reviews.title: True fitting and fast delivery, good pricing
customer_reviews.text: Nice accurate description, no problem with sizing or need to return!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper flyfisherman

customer_reviews.title: shoe great for brace
customer_reviews.text: I have a broken right foot and have to wear a brace inside the shoe so I have to add a size. This product works great for that thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worn these for years
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes that I have. Tried many different brands but these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: peppie24

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Fits great, they are incredibly comfortable! Quality ( looks ) great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mendy Johns

customer_reviews.title: From Fit
customer_reviews.text: They were tighter that I expected for a 13 wide, but after wearing them a few days and breaking them in they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Need to improve the shoe quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoe design is good but it will not keep your feet warm and cold weather
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ellerbee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, very stylish shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My son usually gets the original classic Reebok, but he saw these and had to have them. They look even better I person. We have never had a problem with Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking product
customer_reviews.text: For me, the product runs on the small size from what I used to wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Rich F.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I will buy more in the future
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES PARKER

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. They do need a curve to them though.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Jones

customer_reviews.title: Gift Dad Gift
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my grandfather and he loved it! Total Classics!
customer_reviews.author: Be You Skin by Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product four stars except that it needs to ordered 1/2 half size larger than I normally order.
customer_reviews.author: david n

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome pair of Reebok
customer_reviews.text: A good pair of shoes, they are comfortable and looks great. Good for multiple occasions and can mix and match with different clothes.
customer_reviews.author: kareem N

customer_reviews.title: Great for driving
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable from the moment I put them on. Flexible sole... no break-in required. Light weight. Clipped heal is great for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Noe

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Good shose not good for wet floors slippery careful overall great
customer_reviews.author: Elez

customer_reviews.title: Snow White
customer_reviews.text: Reminisce watching Christopher Wallace in the movie B.I.G , His love for white sneakers ,keeping it clean and stain free LOL . I sure love this grade white and the finish of this sneaker to the back and sole makes its HOT buy
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these only occasionally since I bought it 6 months ago but I can say that the quality is not good. The stitches of the left shoe is already coming off and will fall apart if i cannot find a way to fix this. Also my feet get very sweaty during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Sinking inner heals
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Reebok Renaissance last November for the first time, started having mid back problems. I usually wear Classic leather shoe. I should have returned them after trying them on and noticing that the inner heals sank. 4 months later purchased some walking shoes (walk ultra 6 DMX max) through Reebok and back has improved greatly.
customer_reviews.author: RaJean

customer_reviews.title: The sneakers size was incorrectly labeled. They were labeled ...
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers size was incorrectly labeled. They were labeled 11 1/5 USA which should be an american 11. These were labeled 11 1/5 USA but were actually an america 10 1/5. I tried everything for 2 months to bet them to break in but they never would. I had to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Howard

customer_reviews.title: May be sized a little small!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size larger than I normally would and glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Classic Renaissance Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: It's the dawn of a new day, and this reebok renaissance is as timely now as when it was first released. The beveled heel enhances your stride for improved walking comfort. Meanwhile, a memory tech sock liner delivers unbelievable cushioning. The soft leather upper adds more support and shock absorption.
